title: Branch coverage results hard to interpret

content.raw:
Our test coverage is harder to interpret since we merged branch coverage support in pull request #46. Previously, line of code would be marked green (covered) or red (uncovered). Now there are many lines marked yellow, and it is not clear to me why that is the case. Some of the yellow lines (like [ignition/math/Filter.hh:92](https://codecov.io/bb/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/default/include/ignition/math/Filter.hh#L92) or [ign-math/src/SignalStat.cc:67](https://codecov.io/bb/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/default/src/SignalStats.cc#L67)) don't appear to have any branching at all.

Does anyone else know how to interpret these?
content.html:
Our test coverage is harder to interpret since we merged branch coverage support in pull request #46. Previously, line of code would be marked green (covered) or red (uncovered). Now there are many lines marked yellow, and it is not clear to me why that is the case. Some of the yellow lines (like ignition/math/Filter.hh:92 or ign-math/src/SignalStat.cc:67) don't appear to have any branching at all.

Does anyone else know how to interpret these?
